评论详情: The jacket is beautiful, but the yellow I ordered is orange and brown suede. NOT at all like the pics. And it’s too late to get a replacement.

评论概述: Had to have altered but it looked great!
评论详情: Had it altered to fit my short arms, but the detailing is amazing! I wore it to my wedding so I altered the arm length and I had the vest part taken off, and used one of those buttons to make a loop closure in the front. Very warm, great for fall. Versatile as you could wear it formally or for a costume. Great value for your money, beautiful color. Originally had to return for a smaller size, but the fit was great otherwise!

This is a beautiful, well-made coat.  I am 6' tall and the sleeve length was awesome.  I don't find many tops where the sleeve comes to my hand.  If you are shorter, however, the sleeve may be too long.  I usually wear a 2XL, however, the waist is a bit snug, compared to the rest of the jacket, and pulls on the buttons.  Everything else fit well. i.e. shoulders, bust and length.
Other reviewers said that their normal size fit, NOT even close!. On an up note the quality was nice, but I had to return.
Horrible fit. Arms too narrow and too long but the shoulders were disproportionately wide. The bust was too small but the rest was too big.
I bought this for a masquerade party, and it fit wonderfully and a big hit!  I plan to use it for other times!
Well-made with beautiful color & pattern, lovely detail, and lined inside. Just FYI - Medium was too big for me (5'5", 130ish lbs, busty, narrow shoulders), loose in chest/waist and on the long side.

Love the color and fabric and it's really nicely made for a costume garment.  I was excited they had petite...only it wasn't.  I'm 5'1", 140 lbs. I ordered 2 to be sure I'd get a good fit.  The large petite was baggy in the shoulders, fit around my middle, but the sleeves were way too long.  The medium was great -- a bit snug in the waist but I just snipped the threads anchoring the jacket to the vest and it loosened it up perfectly.

Color seems more burgundy than purple, and that's OK too; it is very deeply toned. Velveteen collar and cuffs which sport embossed designs. Sleeves are long. With arms at sides, my hands are completely inside sleeves, rather than at wrist. Bending arm I can expose my hands, so doesn't look as strange. I think I can shorten the sleeves inside the cuff area. I will try pinning them up some and see ify idea works; I am not a sewing person, so if this idea doesn't work, the sleeves will just be long. Fits snug thru waist, order size up! The waist area also secured with a Velcro tab between buttons 2 & 3, so no gapping. Fully lined. Back is almost smooth fit but because it is snug, there is some tightness "wrinkles". If I lose 10 lbs it would fit better (of course) but I'm not going to stress about it. Am pairing it with black dress pants. Very fun coat.
Oh, what fun it is to be me! Received it as a gift and can think of many times I can wear it during the school year. Great fit and very fashionable.
Fit very well as expected
Bought for a costume but this is quality and I think I could wear it out for a fun night
I usually wear a large and ordered XL and it fit everywhere except the sleeves were way too long. Also didn't like the Velcro closure. Returned!
Fit very poorly. The shoulders were great the length was great the arms were for a monkey. The waist fit but it was apparently for a very busty woman.

I love everything about this purchase. Very fast delivery. Very well made and really good material. It is even lined, which I wasn’t expecting but very pleased about. I ordered yellow and it is more a burnt orange but beautiful. I am 5’7” and 200 lbs. I ordered XL and it fits perfectly. XL is my regular size.

So disappointed with this purchase.  My selection was Yellow the description says Yellow, The picture is a gold yellow but its ORANGE!  It did arrive sooner than expected and the material isn't bad for the price but the color...ugh.  Im a 38DD 5'4' 170 and XL was a good fit.
I love the Jacket, but bigger woman a 3x is small. I knew it be small I order a 3x and wear a 1x and it's small. Like snugged . I wished  little more room. The sleeves are long but I like them long

The style of the coat is really great, but it does run small, and the arms are too long for a woman.  It would have been awesome if the waist had a drawstring on the back for flexibility and style.  Good coat for the price ($55) but I wouldn't pay much more for it.
Incredible quality, style and detail. Makes a great fit for the figure and provides great material thickness!
Awesome dress coat
